properties.value: Crystal shards are items that can be obtained through participating in various activities within Prifddinas. These are necessary to create and charge various crystal equipment through crystal singing, and also can be used to create enhanced crystal keys for the Elven Crystal Chest. Each crystal shard added onto a piece of crystal equipment provides 100 charges, up to a maximum of 20,000.

content:
This article is about the item rewarded from activities around Prifddinas. For the shards used in The Gauntlet, see Crystal shards.
Crystal shard
Released25 July 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableNo
EquipableNo
StackableYes
DestroyDrop
ExamineA shard of the finest crystal, from the crystal city itself.
Values
Value10,000 coins
AlchemyNot alchemisable
Weight0 kg
Advanced data
Item ID23962

Crystal shards are items that can be obtained through participating in various activities within Prifddinas. These are necessary to create and charge various crystal equipment through crystal singing, and also can be used to create enhanced crystal keys for the Elven Crystal Chest. Each crystal shard added onto a piece of crystal equipment provides 100 charges, up to a maximum of 20,000.

Contents

  • 1 Value
  • 2 Obtaining shards
    • 2.1 Exchanging seeds
  • 3 Products
  • 4 Item sources
  • 5 Gallery
  • 6 References

Value[edit | edit source]

Crystal shards and crystal dust are not tradeable, however they can be used to create valuable tradable items.

  2. ^ 2.0 2.1 By using the enhanced crystal key on the Elven Crystal Chest, yielding an additional ~2.8 crystal shards.

Obtaining shards[edit | edit source]

  • Harvesting a crystal tree guarantees 8-10 shards per harvest, and can be increased to 14-16 if using ultracompost.
  • Completing The Gauntlet.
  • Defeating Zalcano.
  • Opening the Elven Crystal Chest.
  • Completing laps of the Prifddinas Agility Course. There is a 1/3 chance to receive a shard each time players travel through a shortcut portal.
  • Catching crystal implings gives a 1/18 chance of receiving 5-10 shards.
  • Killing guards in Prifddinas and NPCs within the Iorwerth Dungeon gives a 1/24 chance of receiving a shard; superior slayer monsters are guaranteed to drop one.
  • Pickpocketing an Elf inside of Prifddinas gives a 1/35 chance to receive a shard; wearing rogue equipment results in receiving two shards.
  • Chopping any tree within Prifddinas with a 1/80 chance to receive crystal shard when receiving a log.[1] Gwenith does NOT count.[2]
  • Mining ore in the Trahaearn mine, mining tephra during the Zalcano fight, as well as mining a Crashed Star, gives a 1/127 chance to obtain a crystal shard when mining an ore, regardless of type.[3]

If a player receives a shard along with a collected resource, while only having a single free inventory space, the crystal shard will be dropped to the floor instead.

Exchanging seeds[edit | edit source]

Players can also obtain crystal shards by exchanging various crystal seeds with Amrod, who is found in the Hefin Inn.

Item Shards exchanged Price GP / Shard
Crystal weapon seed 10 329,083 32,908.3
Crystal tool seed 100 6,357,571 63,575.71
Enhanced crystal teleport seed 150 3,277,757 21,851.71
Crystal armour seed 250 7,328,309 29,313.24
Enhanced crystal weapon seed 1,500 146,305,849 97,537.23
